title: Council Decision of 25 July 1994 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 25 July 1994 appointing the members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (94/C 221/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training for the period from 25 July 1994 to 24 July 1997:
A. Experts from the practising profession
>TABLE>
B. Experts from the medical faculties of the universities
>TABLE>
C. Experts from the competent authorities of the Member States
>TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 July 1994.
For the Council
The President
F.-CH. ZEITLER
(1) OJ No L 167, 30. 6. 1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ No C 80, 30. 3. 1990, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 201, 10. 8. 1990, p. 4.
